description:
Did you recoil at the news that there's *yet another* hot new packaging
tool to cram into your poor crowded brain?

Take heart, brain! It will be all right! uv is splendidly complete and
gloriously simple to use. It's the single tool that can elegantly and
easily replace the whole jumbled toolbox you've been using until now.
See the essential simple usages of uv, and you'll be a believer.
title: uv: Ultimate Victory over Installation and Dependency Chaos
